thread.title: WATCH: The Andy Griffith Show Explains Liberals PERFECTLY
thread.title_full: WATCH: The Andy Griffith Show Explains Liberals PERFECTLY

author: John Falkenberg
title: WATCH: The Andy Griffith Show Explains Liberals PERFECTLY
text:
Stacey Dash Terminated by Fox News, Twitter Erupts in Celebration 
The spoiled kid, the kid with the new bike, Arnold, tells Opie that he’s not supposed to work for his allowance — he’s owed it. But how does Opie this allowance he’s “owed”? 
“Talking is a waste of time,” Arnold said, sounding like an anti-Trump protester. “You have to take action.” 
He has to throw temper tantrums!   
The Problem With Liberals Explained Perfectly The Problem With Liberals Explained Perfectly 
via The Andy Griffith Show 
Posted by Milo Yiannopoulos on Wednesday, November 23, 2016 

Fortunately for Opie, “Pa” set him straight. His multiple tantrum attempts were shot down handily, and Andy Griffith made it known that Opie could not work for his allowance if he didn’t want to — he just wouldn’t get any allowance.
